name: Twitchwatch2
body:
## New version 1.0.3 out, fixes twitch.tv's api change.

### About
TwitchWatch2 is a cross-platform desktop application geared towards twitch.tv notifications.
Here's some features in a pretty list
* Streamer status
* Win/Osx/Lin desktop notifications
* Open stream in browser
* Open stream with livestreamer (requires livestreamer to be installed)

![Preview image](http://i.imgur.com/rexZx9W.png)

![Preview image](http://i.imgur.com/aF2MnLk.png)

### Downloads

Current version: 1.0.3

[Windows installer](https://files.osund.com/TwitchWatch2/1.0.3/TwitchWatch2-1.0.3-win-x64.exe)

[OSX image](https://files.osund.com/TwitchWatch2/1.0.3/TwitchWatch2-1.0.3-osx.dmg.bz2)

[Linux x64](https://files.osund.com/TwitchWatch2/1.0.3/TwitchWatch2-1.0.3-linux-x64.tar.gz)

[Linux x32](https://files.osund.com/TwitchWatch2/1.0.3/TwitchWatch2-1.0.3-linux-ia32.tar.gz)

***

### Feedback & Bugs
Please leave feedback or suggestions at michael@osund.com

Report bugs here on github.
